languages.text: Более того, когда зловредные щупальца варпа протянулись к нашим душам, и кровавая надпись на нечестивом языке начала проступать на переборке, Император благословил меня стать свидетелем чуда. Сестра Арджента, нимало не боясь, подступилась к ней и стерла ее одним бесстрашным движением ладони. Улыбаясь, она обернулась к нам и молвила: "Это всего лишь кровь. Не бойтесь Имматериума, ибо его кошмары ничтожны пред светом Императора". В ту секунду я веровал, что для нас еще не все потеряно. Ныне же я верю, что ошибался.

traits.locale_text: Более того, когда зловредные щупальца варпа протянулись к нашим душам, и кровавая надпись на нечестивом языке начала проступать на переборке, Император благословил меня стать свидетелем чуда. Сестра Арджента, нимало не боясь, подступилась к ней и стерла ее одним бесстрашным движением ладони. Улыбаясь, она обернулась к нам и молвила: "Это всего лишь кровь. Не бойтесь Имматериума, ибо его кошмары ничтожны пред светом Императора". В ту секунду я веровал, что для нас еще не все потеряно. Ныне же я верю, что ошибался.

languages.text: Furthermore, when the malevolent tentacles of the warp reached into our souls, and a bloody inscription in an unholy language began to appear on the bulkhead, the Emperor granted me the blessing of bearing witness to a miracle. Sister Argenta, entirely undaunted, marched up to the bulkhead and erased the words with a fearless swipe of her hand. She turned to us with a smile and said, "It is only blood. Do not fear the Immaterium, for its nightmares are nothing before the Emperor's light." In that moment, I had faith that all was not yet lost. Today I believe I was mistaken.
languages.original_text: Более того, когда зловредные щупальца варпа протянулись к нашим душам, и кровавая надпись на нечестивом языке начала проступать на переборке, Император благословил меня стать свидетелем чуда. Сестра Арджента, нимало не боясь, подступилась к ней и стерла ее одним бесстрашным движением ладони. Улыбаясь, она обернулась к нам и молвила: "Это всего лишь кровь. Не бойтесь Имматериума, ибо его кошмары ничтожны пред светом Императора". В ту секунду я веровал, что для нас еще не все потеряно. Ныне же я верю, что ошибался.

Sister Argenta, entirely undaunted, marched up to the bulkhead and erased the words with a fearless swipe of her hand. She turned to us with a smile and said, "It is only blood. Do not fear the Immaterium, for its nightmares are nothing before the Emperor's light." In that moment, I had faith that all was not yet lost. Today I believe I was mistaken.

Sister Argenta, entirely undaunted, marched up to the bulkhead and erased the words with a fearless swipe of her hand. She turned to us with a smile and said, "It is only blood. Do not fear the Immaterium, for its nightmares are nothing before the Emperor's light." In that moment, I had faith that all was not yet lost. Today I believe I was mistaken.

Furthermore, when the malevolent tentacles of the warp reached into our souls, and a bloody inscription in an unholy language began to appear on the bulkhead, the Emperor granted me the blessing of bearing witness to a miracle. Sister Argenta, entirely undaunted, marched up to the bulkhead and erased the words with a fearless swipe of her hand. She turned to us with a smile and said, "It is only blood. Do not fear the Immaterium, for its nightmares are nothing before the Emperor's light." In that moment, I had faith that all was not yet lost. Today I believe I was mistaken.

languages.text: Más aún, cuando los malignos tentáculos de la disformidad se extendieron hacia nuestras almas y una inscripción sangrienta en un idioma blasfemo apareció en la mampara, el Emperador me permitió presenciar un milagro: la Hermana Argenta, implacable, se acercó a la mampara y borró las palabras con la mano. Se giró hacia nosotros y, sonriendo, declaró «No es más que sangre. No temáis al Inmaterio, pues sus pesadillas se desvanecen ante la luz del Emperador». En aquel momento, pensé que no todo estaba perdido. Hoy creo que me equivocaba.
languages.original_text: Furthermore, when the malevolent tentacles of the warp reached into our souls, and a bloody inscription in an unholy language began to appear on the bulkhead, the Emperor granted me the blessing of bearing witness to a miracle. Sister Argenta, entirely undaunted, marched up to the bulkhead and erased the words with a fearless swipe of her hand. She turned to us with a smile and said, "It is only blood. Do not fear the Immaterium, for its nightmares are nothing before the Emperor's light." In that moment, I had faith that all was not yet lost. Today I believe I was mistaken.

traits.locale_text: Más aún, cuando los malignos tentáculos de la disformidad se extendieron hacia nuestras almas y una inscripción sangrienta en un idioma blasfemo apareció en la mampara, el Emperador me permitió presenciar un milagro: la Hermana Argenta, implacable, se acercó a la mampara y borró las palabras con la mano. Se giró hacia nosotros y, sonriendo, declaró «No es más que sangre. No temáis al Inmaterio, pues sus pesadillas se desvanecen ante la luz del Emperador». En aquel momento, pensé que no todo estaba perdido. Hoy creo que me equivocaba.

languages.text: 不仅如此，当亚空间邪恶的触手伸向我们的灵魂，某种邪恶的鲜血铭文浮现在舱壁上时，帝皇赐予了我恩典，让我亲眼见证了奇迹。阿洁塔修女完全没有一丝畏惧。她走到舱壁前，毫无畏惧地伸手抹掉了那些文字，之后微笑着对我们说：“不过是血而已。不必惧怕亚空间，因为在帝皇的光辉面前，它的恐怖根本不值一提。”在那一刻，我还有信心，相信一切并没有彻底结束。可今天我才意识到，我错了。
languages.original_text: Furthermore, when the malevolent tentacles of the warp reached into our souls, and a bloody inscription in an unholy language began to appear on the bulkhead, the Emperor granted me the blessing of bearing witness to a miracle. Sister Argenta, entirely undaunted, marched up to the bulkhead and erased the words with a fearless swipe of her hand. She turned to us with a smile and said, "It is only blood. Do not fear the Immaterium, for its nightmares are nothing before the Emperor's light." In that moment, I had faith that all was not yet lost. Today I believe I was mistaken.

traits.locale_text: 不仅如此，当亚空间邪恶的触手伸向我们的灵魂，某种邪恶的鲜血铭文浮现在舱壁上时，帝皇赐予了我恩典，让我亲眼见证了奇迹。阿洁塔修女完全没有一丝畏惧。她走到舱壁前，毫无畏惧地伸手抹掉了那些文字，之后微笑着对我们说：“不过是血而已。不必惧怕亚空间，因为在帝皇的光辉面前，它的恐怖根本不值一提。”在那一刻，我还有信心，相信一切并没有彻底结束。可今天我才意识到，我错了。

languages.text: さらに、歪みの邪悪な触手が我々の魂まで届いて、壁に不浄な言葉で書かれた血まみれの文字が現れ始める。皇帝は私に奇跡を目撃する祝福を与えてくださったのだ。シスター・アルジェンタはまったく動じることなく壁に向かって進み、恐れることなく手を滑らせてその言葉を消し去った。彼女は微笑みながらこちらに向き直って「ただの血だ。非物質世界を恐れることはない。皇帝陛下の御光の前で、こんな悪夢など何でもない」と言ってのける。その瞬間、私はまだ全てが失われたわけではないと信じていた。今では、私は間違っていたのだと思っている。
languages.original_text: Furthermore, when the malevolent tentacles of the warp reached into our souls, and a bloody inscription in an unholy language began to appear on the bulkhead, the Emperor granted me the blessing of bearing witness to a miracle. Sister Argenta, entirely undaunted, marched up to the bulkhead and erased the words with a fearless swipe of her hand. She turned to us with a smile and said, "It is only blood. Do not fear the Immaterium, for its nightmares are nothing before the Emperor's light." In that moment, I had faith that all was not yet lost. Today I believe I was mistaken.

traits.locale_text: さらに、歪みの邪悪な触手が我々の魂まで届いて、壁に不浄な言葉で書かれた血まみれの文字が現れ始める。皇帝は私に奇跡を目撃する祝福を与えてくださったのだ。シスター・アルジェンタはまったく動じることなく壁に向かって進み、恐れることなく手を滑らせてその言葉を消し去った。彼女は微笑みながらこちらに向き直って「ただの血だ。非物質世界を恐れることはない。皇帝陛下の御光の前で、こんな悪夢など何でもない」と言ってのける。その瞬間、私はまだ全てが失われたわけではないと信じていた。今では、私は間違っていたのだと思っている。

languages.text: Und als die bösartigen Tentakel des Warp in unsere Seelen eindrangen und eine blutige Inschrift in einer unheiligen Sprache auf dem Schott zu erscheinen begann, gewährte mir der Imperator den Segen, Zeuge eines Wunders zu sein. Schwester Argenta, völlig unerschrocken, marschierte zum Schott und löschte die Worte mit einer furchtlosen Handbewegung. Mit einem Lächeln wandte sie sich an uns und sagte: "Es ist nur Blut. Habt keine Angst vor dem Immaterium, denn seine Albträume sind nichts vor dem Licht des Imperators." In diesem Moment hatte ich den Glauben, dass noch nicht alles verloren war. Heute glaube ich, dass ich mich geirrt habe.
languages.original_text: Furthermore, when the malevolent tentacles of the warp reached into our souls, and a bloody inscription in an unholy language began to appear on the bulkhead, the Emperor granted me the blessing of bearing witness to a miracle. Sister Argenta, entirely undaunted, marched up to the bulkhead and erased the words with a fearless swipe of her hand. She turned to us with a smile and said, "It is only blood. Do not fear the Immaterium, for its nightmares are nothing before the Emperor's light." In that moment, I had faith that all was not yet lost. Today I believe I was mistaken.

languages.text: En outre, lorsque les tentacules malveillants du Warp se sont frayés un chemin jusqu'à nos âmes, et qu'un message impie s'est inscrit en lettres de sang sur une cloison, la grâce de l'Empereur m'a permis d'être témoin d'un miracle. Sœur Argenta, totalement imperturbable, s'est approchée de la paroi et a effacé les mots d'un simple revers de la main. Ensuite, elle s'est tournée vers nous et a affirmé en souriant : « Ce n'est que du sang. Ne craignez pas l'Immaterium, car les cauchemars qu'il abrite ne sont rien face à la lumière de l'Empereur. » À ce moment précis, j'ai cru que tout n'était pas perdu. Aujourd'hui, je me rends compte que j'ai eu tort.
languages.original_text: Furthermore, when the malevolent tentacles of the warp reached into our souls, and a bloody inscription in an unholy language began to appear on the bulkhead, the Emperor granted me the blessing of bearing witness to a miracle. Sister Argenta, entirely undaunted, marched up to the bulkhead and erased the words with a fearless swipe of her hand. She turned to us with a smile and said, "It is only blood. Do not fear the Immaterium, for its nightmares are nothing before the Emperor's light." In that moment, I had faith that all was not yet lost. Today I believe I was mistaken.

traits.locale_text: En outre, lorsque les tentacules malveillants du Warp se sont frayés un chemin jusqu'à nos âmes, et qu'un message impie s'est inscrit en lettres de sang sur une cloison, la grâce de l'Empereur m'a permis d'être témoin d'un miracle. Sœur Argenta, totalement imperturbable, s'est approchée de la paroi et a effacé les mots d'un simple revers de la main. Ensuite, elle s'est tournée vers nous et a affirmé en souriant : « Ce n'est que du sang. Ne craignez pas l'Immaterium, car les cauchemars qu'il abrite ne sont rien face à la lumière de l'Empereur. » À ce moment précis, j'ai cru que tout n'était pas perdu. Aujourd'hui, je me rends compte que j'ai eu tort.

languages.text: Öteboyutun hain dokungaçları ruhlarımıza uzandığında ve bölme panelinde habis bir dilde kanlı bir yazıt belirmeye başladığında İmparator, bana bir mucizeye şahit olma lütfunu bahşetti. Rahibe Argenta, kararlılıkla bölme paneline yönelip korkusuzca elini savurarak sözcükleri sildi. Gülümseyerek bize döndü ve dedi ki: "Kan yalnızca. Tindiyar'dan korkmayın. Onun kâbusları, İmparator'un ışığının altında bir hiçtir." İşte o an henüz her şeyi yitirmediğimize inanmaya başlamıştım. Bugünse bu düşüncemde yanıldığıma inanıyorum.
languages.original_text: Furthermore, when the malevolent tentacles of the warp reached into our souls, and a bloody inscription in an unholy language began to appear on the bulkhead, the Emperor granted me the blessing of bearing witness to a miracle. Sister Argenta, entirely undaunted, marched up to the bulkhead and erased the words with a fearless swipe of her hand. She turned to us with a smile and said, "It is only blood. Do not fear the Immaterium, for its nightmares are nothing before the Emperor's light." In that moment, I had faith that all was not yet lost. Today I believe I was mistaken.

traits.locale_text: Öteboyutun kötücül dokungaçları ruhlarımıza uzandığında ve bölme panelinde habis bir dilde kanlı bir işleme belirmeye başladığında İmparator, bana bir mucizeye şahit olma lütfunu bahşetti. Rahibe Argenta, kararlılıkla bölme paneline yönelip korkusuzca elini savurarak sözcükleri sildi. Gülümseyerek bize döndü ve dedi ki: "Kan yalnızca. Tindiyar'dan korkmayın. Buranın kâbusları, İmparator'un ışığının yanında bir hiçtir." O anda her şeyi kaybetmediğimize inanmaya başladım. Bugünse bu düşüncemde yanıldığıma inanıyorum.
